questions.question: How effectively does the board shape and oversee the organization’s long-term strategy?
questions.description: Assess the board’s role in guiding, challenging, and supporting strategy while ensuring long-term success. Does the board allocate sufficient time to long-term strategic discussions rather than just reviewing management updates? How effectively does the board challenge and refine management’s strategic proposals? Does the board have a clear view of external trends, risks, and opportunities shaping strategy?
